      • LocalPanel

        public LocalPanel(LocationWeather locW,
                  Preferences p)
        Creates a new panel that will display the weather located in a single weather object representing a local forecast
        Parameters:
        locW - An object containing all of the weather data for a given location
        p - A preference object that governs what information is hidden/shown and the preferred temperature units

        private javax.swing.JLabel makeLabel(java.lang.String lbl,

        Makes a new JLabel with the specified font, with white text of the given size
        Parameters:
        lbl - the text to be contained in the JLabel
        size - the font size for the JLabel
        type - the style specified for the font in the JLabel
        Returns:

      • makeValueLabel

        private javax.swing.JPanel makeValueLabel(java.lang.String label,
                                          java.lang.String value,
                                          int offset,
                                          int size,
                                          int type)
        Makes a new Jpanel that has two aligned Jlabels with width offset
        Parameters:
        label - the label of the value
        value - the value to be displayed
        offset - the total size of the JPanel
        size - the size of the font
        type - the type of the font: Bold, Plain, etc
        Returns:
        a JPanel containing a value and its label in a format specified by the parameters
